评论概述: Durable! Hard quality to find nowadays
评论详情: I've worn a variety of button-up shirts over the years, from Prada to Carhartt, for different occasions – from operas to blue-collar work. Let me tell you this right now: this shirt can work for just about any occasion.  What I love about it: the fit, feel, and durability. I lost a good amount of weight and needed to size down, I tried a few Amazon brands, and one black shirt really stood out. It's this model. I've had it for about a year, machine-washed and dried it regularly, and it still looks as good as new. I bought another one a couple months later. It's 100% cotton, which I love for its breathability, but it does wrinkle a bit. Usually it's a trade off in shirts, but again; AMAZING FEEL. It's fairly light so definitely layer up if it's cold; I wore a merino wool base layer underneath and holy guacamole was I comfortable! Although it is long sleeve, it might not keep you the warmest alone, but if you use it in the spring/summer, you're going to love it. When I used it for working on my dad's farm, I honestly didn't care about the wrinkles, but it was never terrible wrinkling. In fact, I got the sleeves hemmed and noticed the wringling on the sleeves is minimal compared to how it was prior, so be prepared to stop by the tailor if you're on the shorter side for that perfect fit (def worth it though). If you ever want to use it for an interview or something, this might not be ideal, but definitely can pass if you hang it in the shower to steam and can impress if you take the time to iron and starche it. I'm on the shorter side, so I usually rolled up the sleeves to avoid wrinkling prior to getting them altered.  I'm 5'6", and am just got the sleeves hemmed. I love this shirt so much I bought multiple. So it'll be nice having more colors in my wardrobe that are good quality and fit well. I'm a fan of the pocket too, even though I don't use it much.  Now, here's the thing I don't like, and it's not what you'd expect. Have you ever heard of an expression, something along the lines of "if you're not paying for it, someone else is" in regards to fast fashion like Shein and such...It's the ethical aspect – I don't know who made this shirt or the conditions they worked in. I'm hoping the quality speaks for itself as this is far from the "fast fashion" quality you see in modern clothes nowadays. The price isn't terribly cheap...but still, it could be made by kids in the same environment as those old Nike documentaries. I've shifted to buying from countries where I know workers aren't exploited (such as in the USA or Japan). As one working man trying to build a better life for himself, I don't want to shop at the expense of someone else. I had a difficult time finding information, but I'm kind of in a tricky spot as I lost some weight and need something in my closet. But if you're looking for quality that lasts and looks good, this shirt delivers. Try one or two first, and if it feels great, go for it.  I'm graduating university soon and hope to make more money where I can buy stuff 100% ethically, so don't think I'll be buying this again unless they make it very transparent where it's coming from. But for interviews or hardworking days when you need something sturdy, I highly recommend this; nothing comes close to bang for buck. If I find out it's ethically made, this will be my first choice for life indefinitely. This is the type of standard quality clothes that were originally held to decades ago.  [update: all of my shirts say they're made in Vietnam. I feel it's a step above China and Bangladesh, and the fact that Amazon is putting its name on it, I'm hoping it's at least following stricter labor standards, as there are some good trends in Vietnam humanity speaking. Feel pretty good about buying from them :) Again, typically, I try to buy from the US or Japan, but since I'm on a budget, I am perfectly happy with this and can recommend it to anyone else! changing review to 5/5 stars!]

Got it for a great price. But even at regular price it's worth the money. Light soft cotton. Great sizing and fit. I feel bad that I'm buying from a giant corporate monster instead of a local retailer. But at this point we are stuck.
Neck fit well Good sleeve lengh Washes well All good

评论概述: Very, very comfortable in hot weather
评论详情: These shirts are high-quality, 100% cotton, made of a thin, but durable, poplin weave. If you want a super comfortable, soft, very breathable, durable, and classy shirt, this is it. But because it is a comfortable 100% cotton material it will wrinkle slightly after washing, but I think it looks kind of classy with a slight patina of wrinkles, unlike the scratchy, stiff, hot and stuffy feeling polyester shirts that don’t breathe but don’t need ironing. If you need a stiff, perfectly unwrinkled looking office shirt, you should probably buy something else that has a lot of uncomfortable polyester in it. This shirt could be worn in a formal office setting, but you may need to touch it up with an iron after each wash. I normally wear size large shirt, but since this is 100% cotton, I decided to get size extra large to allow for shrinkage for a fit, and I’m glad I did, but I have bought these shirts before in size large and they fit with a more tailored look, but I prefer a roomier fit. I have not used an electric clothes dryers on them, but instead, just hang them on a clothes hangar to save energy and prevent them from shrinking, just like I do with my Levi’s. Excellent shirt—I bought a half dozen of them already.
Looks good tucked in or untucked. Great colors and just an overall great value!

评论概述: Nice shirts, but arms too long
评论详情: Needed more shirts and bought 4 of these (different colors and styles) on sale. Wasn't sure what to expect from Amazon brand shirts at a discount price, but they are well made, solid shirts. I was particularly concerned since some of the reviews mentioned the shirts being kind of short but, at least at my height of 5'7", I didn't have that issue. I did, however, have the reverse problem. For me, the arms were too long. I normally wear a 15.5/32-33 shirt and medium shirts normally fit me just fine. For these shirts, though, the arms were more like a 34-35 so really too long on me.
I had to go a size up on this one but the shirt feels great and looks nice.  Would buy this style again.

评论概述: Thin Material and Not Wrinkle Free
类型: Size: MediumColor: Light Grey White Checked
评论详情: You get what you pay for with this shirt.  It's not high-quality.  It's 100% cotton, so after washing it will have micro-wrinkles all over it - which is typical for cotton.  If you are expecting a "dress" shirt, you will need some serious ironing.  However, for a casual wrinkly look, it's fine.  The material is rather thin.  The fit is okay if you are not on the heavy side.  It's not a "fitted" shirt, but it doesn't have extra room.  Since I'm on the thinner side, I actually prefer this shirt over others that are too loose.

I didn't like this shirt at first, I thought it was thin and wrinkled easily. The large was a nice, roomy sized large.  The color and fit are pretty good for someone with shorter arms.  After losing a little weight, I think these are super baggy now.  If you're on the slimmer side, you might want to size down.
